title: University of the Rockies Hosts Graduation Ceremony on Saturday, Oct. 24 (University of the Rockies) ...
text: ( Source : University of the Rockies ) University of the Rockies will hold its commencement ceremony at 2 p.m. MDT , Saturday, Oct. 24, in the Mile High Ballroom at the Colorado Convention Center , located at 700 14th Street . Graduates and their
